attributes.action: force all power companies to buy back electricity produced by micro home generation at twice the standard rate.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Power companies at present buy electricity generated by environmentally concerned individuals at below market rate.  This discourages micro home generation and is harmful therefore to the environment.  Making the power companies buy at a higher level will benefit us all and encourage the spread of home generated electricity
